title: Question
body: So I am moving to Germany soon and I am currently in North America, if I switch my region and the name I currently have is taken does that mean I will not have my name?

replies.body: Sadly yes. If someone is already using your Summoner Name on the server you're transferring to, you will be prompted to choose a new name once the transfer is complete.
alright thank you, one more question if I live in Ramstein Germany what region would I change to?
EUW would be the best for Ramstein ^_^!
